Description.Text: Jumeirah Creekside Hotel is a modern 5-star property offering luxury accommodation near the heart of Dubai. Highlights include fine dining, multiple pools, a contemporary spa, several tennis courts and a great location overlooking Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club. Dubai Creek is located in the heart of the city, a pleasant body of water separating Deira from Bur Dubai. Nearby places of interest include the Port Saeed district, the Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club and Deira City Centre shopping mall. GGICO metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Dubai destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise complex featuring a sleek, angular, glass facade. Facilities include two outdoor swimming pools, multiple tennis courts, two squash courts, modern fitness centres, a beach volleyball court, Jacuzzis, saunas, steam rooms and a chic spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 42-49sqm and elegantly decorated in a modern style with rich colours and contemporary furniture design. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, iPod dock, mini-bar (non-alcoholic drinks included), work desk and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub, separate walk-in shower and complimentary toiletries. Nomad serves fine Asian cuisine in a chic, contemporary space, its attached deli facilitating 24-hour dining. Elsewhere, fine seafood and steak specialities are available at Blue Flame, and stunning views, expertly-crafted cocktails, tapas, light meals and cigars can be enjoyed at the rooftop Cu-ba. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service and offers a complimentary beach and shopping mall shuttle service.
